info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 23 at 9:39PM EST until February 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Some sleet and freezing rain may occur for areas along and south of Interstate 90 Friday morning. * WHERE...All of eastern New York and western New England, with the heaviest snowfall amounts mainly north of Interstate 90. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed an inch per hour at times from 3 am to 11 am Friday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
